name: ActionScript-3-Omnicomplete
description:
This plug-in will enable omnicompletion for ActionScript 3 files.

It covers the majority of classes in the &#039flash&#039 package but still lacks those found in &#039mx&#039, &#039air&#039, and &#039flashx&#039.

Obviously, a work in progress.
install_details: Copy &#039actionscriptcomplete.vim&#039 to the &#039autoload&#039 directory and &#039actionscript.vim&#039 to &#039ftplugin&#039.
